product_overview: Saylani Welfare Clone is a responsive website replicating the UI/UX of the original Saylani Welfare NGO site. It showcases their free IT and vocational training and welfare services through a modern, clean, and professional front-end implementation, using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
core_goals: Create a fully responsive website compatible with mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.
Develop an easy-to-navigate interface with dropdown menus optimized for mobile.
Replicate the original NGO's services section with clear visual icons.
Embed media updates including YouTube videos for real-time communication.
Enable newsletter subscription to engage users.
Ensure cross-browser compatibility and fast load times through optimized images and clean code.
key_features: Responsive navigation bar with dropdown menu for mobile devices and smooth toggle functionality.
Service sections presenting welfare programs visually with icons and concise information.
Embedded YouTube videos displaying media updates and events.
Newsletter subscription form included in the Saylani Guide section for user engagement.
Footer containing contact information and social media links for easy outreach.
About page with organization information mirroring the original site.
Use of Google Fonts (Montserrat, Poppins) and Font Awesome icons for modern UI aesthetics.
Implementation of media queries for adaptive layout across devices.
user_flow_summary: Users access the homepage and navigate through the responsive navigation bar.
Mobile users interact with the toggle button to reveal dropdown navigation.
Users explore various service sections to learn about welfare programs.
Users watch embedded media updates for latest news and events.
Users can subscribe to the newsletter through the form in the Saylani Guide section.
Users explore additional pages like About to learn more about the organization.
Users navigate to the footer for contact details and social media links.
validation_criteria: Website layout adjusts fluidly across different screen sizes including mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Dropdown menu toggles correctly on mobile without UI glitches.
All service icons and descriptions render accurately as per design.
Embedded YouTube videos play smoothly and are responsive.
Newsletter subscription form validates email input and submits correctly.
Footer information is complete and social media links are functional.
Website performs consistently across major modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge).
